summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Union Street from 4th Avenue to 9th Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction and reconstruction of a street lighting system, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9171 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
